page.title: 10TIBBERTON SCHOOLCHILDS DAY 2
page.content: which was at 10.20 am,the lesson would be Maths and after break, which finished at 10.45,the children would have games.Lunch started at 12.45 pm and finished at 1.45 pm.For lunch the usual meal was sandwiches and a drink.When they had finished their lunch they would play games in the playground such as tig or adventure games.The lessons in the afternoon were English and Science.School finished at 3.20 pm and they got home at about 3.30 pm. {AFTER SCHOOL}-When they got home they would watch the television.After tea which would be chips or salad they would either watch television or go out to play with their friends. Sometimes they had some homework so they stayed in and did that instead. Bedtime was between 8.30-9.30,then they brushed their teeth and washed.
